title: Kyien 6-Piece Turtle Shape Knob Wardrobe Handle Drawer Single Hole Knob (Silver)..
features: → SIZE ←: Approx. The surface of the knob is about 1.18 inches in diameter and 0.98 inches high.It is available in antique silver,black,pink and purple.The pink and purple knobs are treated with a special drip wax process and are very beautiful.
→ APPLICATIONS ←: These sea turtle shape knobs can be nice replacements for the old or damaged knobs.They can be widely applied to cabinet,wardrobe,closet,cupboard,bookcase,drawer,dresser,etc.
→ EASY TO INSTALL←: Find the position where you want to install on the board and drill a hole,then pass through the screw from the back of board and tighten to the knob.

→ UNIQUE APPEARANCE ←: These knobs are made of high-quality materials,good abrasion resistance,modern and simple shape,beautiful,stable and durable,multi-layer surface technology,with anti-oxidation and corrosion resistance，make home life more comfortable.
description: → Made of high quality zinc alloy,not easy to break and rust,ensuring durability and longevity.  →

→The surface of the knob is about 1.18 inches in diameter and 0.98 inches high.It is available in antique silver,black,pink and purple.The pink and purple knobs are treated with a special drip wax process and are very beautiful.  →
→ These knobs can be applied to dresser,cabinet,wardrobe,closet,cupboard,bookcase,drawer,bedside cupboard,and other furniture pieces.  →
→ Pretty ocean theme pull handles,suitable for use in seaside villa,cottage,kitchen,bathroom,bedroom,hotel,office or other places.  →
→ 6 x cabinet knobs,6 sets mounting screws.    →

1. 1-10 mm error might exist due to manual measurements, please kindly understand.  2. Different light shooting and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little difference from the real thing.
